column4: Has anyone had any success getting wireless networking to work with a Dell Latitude D610, it uses the Intel Pro Wireless 2915ABG Network Adapter
I just reinstalled breezy the other day, clean install off the Breezy Install CD
there is a driver for that chipset, but it requires at least a 2.6.13 kernel.
It had not worked on my previous kernel, 2.6.15, and it isnt working on my 2.6.12 now
